Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui

Class SolaGuiDocument

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.SolaGuiDocument
public class SolaGuiDocument extends Object
SolaGuiDocument is a container for GuiElements. It also contains several utility methods for creating instances of gui elements, setting the root element of a tree, and searching for elements in the tree.
